nodes.text: Shaum Hii was a planet in Tragan Cluster of the Outer Rim Territories.

The native Kian'thar rode bentails and herded derlacs for meat. The planet was discovered 300 BBY. In 297 BBY, the natives began developing strong ties with Black Sun. During the Clone Wars the planet was located within Separatist space. The planet had direct representation in the New Republic. It was conquered by the Yuuzhan Vong during the Yuuzhan Vong War.
